name: Optimove
description: Optimove provides a loyalty and CRM platform that enhances customer retention and engagement through data-driven insights.

name: Sheer ID
description: Sheer ID provides an identity marketing platform that verifies customer eligibility for exclusive offers and discounts.

name: Talon.One
description: Talon.One offers a promotion and loyalty management platform that enables businesses to create customized loyalty programs.

name: Voucherify
description: Voucherify offers a promotion engine and API that helps businesses manage and track voucher and coupon campaigns.
